name: George's Place
description:
Every spring you visit your friend, George the mouse in their lovely logpile house. But when you arrive George is missing. Find them!

Created in Bitsy for Global Game JAM 19, with Micro:bit cheeseshaker, Decision making Reindeer Ozobot & Makey Makey controllers.

Micro:bit controller - shake it when told to do so.

Ozobot Reindeer controller - put it on the centre spot when told to do so and press the appropriate Makey Makey key it chooses.
